info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued October 17 at 5:45PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 615 PM EDT FOR NORTH CENTRAL HERTFORD...NORTHWESTERN GATES...SOUTHWESTERN ISLE OF WIGHT...AND SOUTHEASTERN SOUTHAMPTON COUNTIES...THE CITY OF FRANKLIN AND THE SOUTHWESTERN CITY OF SUFFOLK... At 544 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Como, or 8 miles north of Murfreesboro, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and powerlines. This severe storm will be near... Franklin around 555 PM EDT. Carrsville around 610 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Riddicksville, Sunbeam, Lees Mill, Handsom, Riverdale, Wyanoke, Drum Hill, Cleopus, Elwood and Dort. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
